nodes.text: K-DROID, also known as FM Droid, was a station that played Top 40 droid music on frequency 109.7. It was the favorite station of G2-9T, a G2 repair droid working for the Star Tours travel agency. In 4.3 ABY, K-DROID broadcast "I Wanna Weld Your Hand," the latest hit from "Danny and the Droids," while G2-9T was listening to the station.

K-DROID was originally created for the 1987 Disney simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, and could be heard playing in the ride's queue. The station was alternatively identified as FM Droid in the Complete Guide to Star Tours, a document published by the Planning Office for Tokyo Disneyland Relations and Matsushita Electric Industrial Co..
